TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LinkLabel extends System.Windows.Forms.Label implements class System.Windows.Forms.IButtonControl
Public Class LinkLabel Inherits Label Implements IButtonControl
public ref class LinkLabel : System::Windows::Forms::Label, System::Windows::Forms::IButtonControl
type LinkLabel = class inherit Label interface IButtonControl

summary.span: 表示可显示超链接的 Windows 标签控件。

span.span: Represents a Windows label control that can display hyperlinks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制取代并添加了功能和控件。The control replaces and adds functionality to the and controls. 但是，和控件将保留用于向后兼容性并供将来使用，如果您选择。However, the and controls are retained for both backward compatibility and future use, if you choose. 控件是类似于控件使用它可以显示超链接的异常。The control is similar to a control with the exception that it can display a hyperlink. 控件的文本中，可以指定多个超链接。Multiple hyperlinks can be specified in the text of the control. 每个超链接可执行应用程序中不同的任务。Each hyperlink can perform a different task within an application. 例如，可以使用超链接，在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 中显示 Web 站点或加载与应用程序关联的日志文件。For example, you can use a hyperlink to display a Web site in Microsoft Internet Explorer or to load a log file associated with an application. 中显示每个超链接控件是实例类。Each hyperlink displayed in the control is an instance of the class. 类定义显示信息、 状态和超链接的位置。The class defines display information, state, and location of the hyperlink. 此外，属性的类使你能够将相关联的信息，例如要显示与超链接的 URL。In addition, the property of the class enables you to associate information, such as a URL to display, with the hyperlink. 当用户单击该控件内的超链接引发事件，并对象表示超链接被单击的一部分传递作为参数传递给事件处理程序对象。When a user clicks a hyperlink within the control, the event is raised, and the object representing the hyperlink that was clicked is passed as part of the object that is passed as a parameter to the event handler. 可以使用此对象以获取用户已单击超链接相关联的对象。You can use this object to obtain the object associated with the hyperlink that was clicked by the user. 中包含的所有超链接都存储在控件控件的类实例。All hyperlinks contained within the control are stored in the class instance for the control. 有两种方法添加到超链接控件。There are two ways to add a hyperlink to the control. 最快方法是指定并将其分配给属性。The quickest way is to specify a and assign it to the property. 这使您指定的控件文本内的单个超链接。This enables you to specify a single hyperlink within the text of the control. 若要添加多个超链接，可以使用方法类的访问通过集合属性。To add multiple hyperlinks, you can use the method of the class by accessing the collection through the property. 当创建控件时，默认的超链接，其中包含中的所有文本控件添加到。When a control is created, a default hyperlink that contains all the text within the control is added to the . 可以通过指定与新链接区域覆盖此默认链接属性，或指定链接使用方法的。You can override this default link by specifying a new link area with the property, or specify a link using the method of the . 此外可通过删除默认超链接方法的类。You can also remove the default hyperlink by using the method of the class. 属性是`true`默认情况下，只要不存在的长度大于零中至少一个链接集合。The property is `true` by default, as long as there is at least one link of greater than zero length in the collection. 控件都有一个值。The control has a single value. 但是，每个链接的长度大于零获取其自己的制表位，按从左到右顺序。However, each link of greater than zero length gets its own tab stop, in left-to-right order. 为了防止 tab 键导航到控件，将属性设置为`false`。To prevent tab navigation to the control, set the property to `false`. 但是，请注意，将新链接添加到集合将自动设置属性设置为`true`再次。However, be aware that adding new links to the collection will automatically set the property to `true` again. 提供了多个使您可以在控件中定义的超链接的显示外观的属性。The provides a number of properties that enable you to define the display appearance of hyperlinks in the control. ， ， ，和属性定义在各种状态中显示超链接时使用的颜色。The , , , and properties define the colors used when displaying a hyperlink in various states. 属性定义与超链接相关联的下划线显示。The property defines the display of the underline that is associated with a hyperlink. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何使用类。The following example demonstrates using the class. 示例处理通过打开网站上的事件。The example handles the event by opening a Web site. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelSimple/CS/form.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelSimple/VB/form.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示了如何使用类，与多个部分定义，以在窗体上显示的标签。The following example demonstrates using the class, with multiple sections defined, to display a label on a form. 该示例演示了如何设置， ， ， ，并可自定义查找范围的属性。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , and properties to customize the look of the . 第一个使用指定的属性。The first is specified using the property. 其他链接添加到使用方法。Additional links are added to the using the method. 示例句柄启动 Web 浏览器的超链接，并显示事件其他链接。The example handles the event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a for other links. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel/CPP/linklabel.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel/CS/linklabel.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel/VB/linklabel.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color ActiveLinkColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };
member this.ActiveLinkColor : System.Drawing.Color with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用来显示活动链接的颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the color used to display an active link.

value.span: ，表示用来显示活动链接的颜色。

span.span: A that represents the color to display an active link.

value.span: 默认颜色由系统指定，通常，此颜色为 。

span.span: The default color is specified by the system, typically this color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 活动链接是正在被单击的链接。An active link is a link that is in the process of being clicked. 它类似于按下状态的控件。This is similar to the depressed state of a control. 此属性可用于指定该链接显示在过程中所单击的链接时的颜色。You can use this property to specify the color that the link is displayed in when the link is in the process of being clicked. 有若干种与链接相关联的颜色。There are a number of colors associated with a link. 指定在显示的所有链接的颜色控件。The specifies the color of all links displayed in the control. 属性可用于指定链接的颜色后用户访问。The property enables you to specify the color of a link after it has been visited by the user. 当禁用链接时，用于显示链接处于禁用状态。When a link is disabled, the is used to display the link in a disabled state. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性时，请确保颜色设置要与该控件的背景的颜色不冲突的属性或不正确显示文本。When setting this property, ensure that the color you are setting the property to does not conflict with the color of the control's background or the text does not display properly. 例如，如果该控件的背景色`Color.Red`和此属性设置为`Color.Red`，是不能正确显示文本时该链接是所单击的过程中。For example, if the background color of the control is `Color.Red` and this property is set to `Color.Red`, the text is not shown properly when the link is in the process of being clicked. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何设置属性使用枚举。The following example demonstrates setting the property using the enumeration. 它还演示如何设置，和属性。It also demonstrates setting the , and properties. 若要运行此示例将其粘贴在空白的窗体并调用`InitializeLinkLabel`从窗体的构造函数或`Load`方法。To run this sample paste it in a blank form and call `InitializeLinkLabel` from the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 为 控件创建一个新的辅助功能对象。

span.span: Creates a new accessibility object for the control.
A new for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不显式调用 方法，则在引用 属性时将会调用此方法。If you do not explicitly call the method, it will be called when the property is referenced. 注意:要获取或设置 属性，必须添加对与 .NET Framework 一起安装的 Accessibility 程序集的引用。Note: To get or set the property, you must add a reference to the Accessibility assembly installed with the .NET Framework. 对继承者的说明：重写时派生类中不应调用基类的方法。Notes to Inheritors: When overriding in a derived class, you should not call the base class's method.

summary.span: 继承的类应该始终在重写此方法时调用 。

span.span: Inheriting classes should always call when overriding this method.

summary.span: 获取或设置显示禁用链接时所用的颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the color used when displaying a disabled link.

value.span: ，表示显示禁用链接时所用的颜色。

span.span: A that represents the color when displaying a disabled link.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以指定有关在中禁用的链接颜色。This property enables you to specify the color for links that are disabled in the . 已禁用的链接不会导致事件被引发。Disabled links do not cause the event to be raised. 有若干种与链接相关联的颜色。There are a number of colors associated with a link. 中的所有链接中定义的颜色与最初显示属性。All links in the are initially displayed with the color defined in the property. 属性，可在过程中被单击时指定链接的颜色。The property enables you to specify the color of the link when it is in the process of being clicked. 属性可用于指定链接的颜色后用户访问。The property enables you to specify the color of a link after it has been visited by the user. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性时，请确保颜色设置要与该控件的背景的颜色不冲突的属性或不正确显示文本。When setting this property, ensure that the color you are setting the property to does not conflict with the color of the control's background or the text does not display properly. 例如，如果该控件的背景色`Color.Red`和此属性设置为`Color.Red`，文本不能正确显示禁用链接时。For example, if the background color of the control is `Color.Red` and this property is set to `Color.Red`, the text is not shown properly when the link is disabled. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何使用类，与多个部分定义，以在窗体上显示的标签。The following example demonstrates using the class, with multiple sections defined, to display a label on a form. 该示例演示了如何设置， ， ， ，并可自定义查找范围的属性。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , and properties to customize the look of the . 第一个使用指定的属性。The first is specified using the property. 其他链接添加到使用方法。Additional links are added to the using the method. 示例句柄启动 Web 浏览器的超链接，并显示事件其他链接。The example handles the event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a for other links. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel/CPP/linklabel.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel/CS/linklabel.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel/VB/linklabel.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置文本中视为链接的范围。

span.span: Gets or sets the range in the text to treat as a link.

value.span: ，表示视为链接的区域。

span.span: A that represents the area treated as a link.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供的快速方法来指定要显示的文本中的单个超链接控件。The property provides a quick way to specify a single hyperlink to display in the text of the control. 对象提供指定控件的文本和超链接的文本的长度内的链接的起始位置的属性。The object provides properties that specify the starting position of the link within the text of the control and the length of text for the hyperlink. 当使用指定超链接时属性，该超链接添加到的控件。When a hyperlink is specified using the property, the hyperlink is added to the of the control. 属性将转换对象，将其分配集合中存储的对象。The property converts the object assigned to it to a object that is stored within the collection. 若要将多个超链接添加到该控件的文本，可以使用属性。To add multiple hyperlinks to the text of the control, you can use the property. 属性使您能够访问的属性和方法的，它存储为控件指定的链接。The property enables you to access the properties and methods of the , which stores the links specified for the control. 此方法将添加到链接的还可用于指定数据在与正在创建的链接关联的属性。This method of adding links to the also enables you to specify data in the property that is associated with the link being created. 值属性可以用于存储要显示的文件的位置或 Web 站点的地址。The value of the property can be used to store the location of a file to display or the address of a Web site. 当创建控件时，默认的超链接，其中包含中的所有文本控件添加到。When a control is created, a default hyperlink that contains all the text within the control is added to the . 可以通过指定与新链接区域覆盖此默认链接属性，或指定链接使用方法的。You can override this default link by specifying a new link area with the property, or specify a link using the method of the . 此外可通过删除默认超链接方法的类。You can also remove the default hyperlink by using the method of the class. > [!NOTE] > 属性始终返回的第一项，不管如何超链接添加到集合。The property always returns the first item in the , regardless of how the hyperlink was added to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 上的属性如果您调用将相同，和属性包含双字节字符。The property on will differ if you call , and the property contains double-byte characters. 如果调用，它将在字符串中返回的字节数。If you call , it will return the number of bytes in the string. 否则，它将返回实际字符的数。Otherwise, it will return the number of actual characters. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何使用类，与多个部分定义，以在窗体上显示的标签。The following example demonstrates using the class, with multiple sections defined, to display a label on a form. 该示例演示了如何设置， ， ， ，并可自定义查找范围的属性。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , and properties to customize the look of the . 第一个使用指定的属性。The first is specified using the property. 其他链接添加到使用方法。Additional links are added to the using the method. 示例句柄启动 Web 浏览器的超链接，并显示事件其他链接。The example handles the event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a for other links. summary.span: 获取或设置一个表示链接的行为的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that represents the behavior of a link.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以指定控件中显示时的链接行为。This property enables you to specify the behavior of links when they are displayed in the control. 例如，如果你想在鼠标指针位于链接上时才会显示带下划线的链接，您可以将此属性设置为`LinkBehavior.HoverUnderline`。For example, if you want links to be displayed with an underline only when the mouse pointer is over a link, you can set this property to `LinkBehavior.HoverUnderline`. 有关可以与链接相关联的行为的类型的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on the types of behaviors that can be associated with a link, see . ## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何使用类，与多个部分定义，以在窗体上显示的标签。The following example demonstrates using the class, with multiple sections defined, to display a label on a form. 该示例演示了如何设置， ， ， ，并可自定义查找范围的属性。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , and properties to customize the look of the . 第一个使用指定的属性。The first is specified using the property. 其他链接添加到使用方法。Additional links are added to the using the method. 示例句柄启动 Web 浏览器的超链接，并显示事件其他链接。The example handles the event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a for other links. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel/CPP/linklabel.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel/CS/linklabel.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel/VB/linklabel.vb#1)]

exception.span: 分配的值不是 值之一。

span.span: A value is assigned that is not one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event LinkClicked As LinkLabelLinkClickedEventHandler

summary.span: 当单击控件内的链接时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a link is clicked within the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，处理事件时要执行的任务在用户单击控件中的链接。Typically, the event is handled to perform tasks when the user clicks on a link in the control. 事件处理程序事件传递的实例类，该类包含与被单击的链接相关联的对象。The event handler for the event is passed an instance of the class that contains a object that is associated with the link that was clicked. 您可以使用信息中指定属性的类来确定哪个链接被单击或单击该链接时要执行的任务的类型。You can use information specified in the property of class to determine which link was clicked or what type of task to perform when the link is clicked. 例如，如果控件具有使用定义的对象及其属性设置为字符串`www.microsoft.com`，你可以在事件处理程序中使用此信息事件，以显示 Web 站点。For example, if a control has a object defined with its property set to the string `www.microsoft.com`, you can use this information in an event handler for the event to display the Web site. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何使用类。The following example demonstrates using the class. 示例处理通过打开网站上的事件。The example handles the event by opening a Web site. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelSimple/CS/form.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelSimple/VB/form.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示了如何使用类，与多个部分定义，以在窗体上显示的标签。The following example demonstrates using the class, with multiple sections defined, to display a label on a form. 该示例演示了如何设置， ， ， ，并可自定义查找范围的属性。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , and properties to customize the look of the . 第一个使用指定的属性。The first is specified using the property. 其他链接添加到使用方法。Additional links are added to the using the method. 示例句柄启动 Web 浏览器的超链接，并显示事件其他链接。The example handles the event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a for other links. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel/CPP/linklabel.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel/CS/linklabel.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel/VB/linklabel.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color LinkColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };
member this.LinkColor : System.Drawing.Color with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置显示普通链接时使用的颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the color used when displaying a normal link.

value.span: ，表示用来显示普通链接的颜色。

span.span: A that represents the color used to displaying a normal link.

value.span: 默认颜色由系统指定，通常，此颜色为 。

span.span: The default color is specified by the system, typically this color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以指定最初为中的所有链接显示的颜色。This property enables you to specify the color that is initially displayed for all links in the . 有若干种与链接相关联的颜色。There are a number of colors associated with a link. 属性，可在过程中被单击时指定链接的颜色。The property enables you to specify the color of the link when it is in the process of being clicked. 属性可用于指定链接的颜色后用户访问。The property enables you to specify the color of a link after it has been visited by the user. 当禁用链接时，用于显示链接处于禁用状态。When a link is disabled, the is used to display the link in a disabled state. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性时，请确保颜色设置要与该控件的背景的颜色不冲突的属性或不正确显示文本。When setting this property, ensure that the color you are setting the property to does not conflict with the color of the control's background or the text does not display properly. 例如，如果该控件的背景色`Color.Red`和此属性设置为`Color.Red`，不能正确显示的链接的文本。For example, if the background color of the control is `Color.Red` and this property is set to `Color.Red`, the text of the link is not shown properly. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何使用类，与多个部分定义，以在窗体上显示的标签。The following example demonstrates using the class, with multiple sections defined, to display a label on a form. 该示例演示了如何设置， ， ， ，并可自定义查找范围的属性。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , and properties to customize the look of the . 第一个使用指定的属性。The first is specified using the property. 其他链接添加到使用方法。Additional links are added to the using the method. 示例句柄启动 Web 浏览器的超链接，并显示事件其他链接。The example handles the event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a for other links. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel/CPP/linklabel.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel/CS/linklabel.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel/VB/linklabel.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Links As LinkLabel.LinkCollection

summary.span: 获取包含在 内的链接的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of links contained within the .

value.span: ，表示包含在 控件内的链接。

span.span: A that represents the links contained within the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个控件可以显示任意数量的控件文本内链接。A control can display any number of links within the text of the control. 此属性可以访问与关联实例表示的控件中显示的链接的集合。This property enables you to access the instance associated with the that represents the collection of links displayed in the control. 然后可以使用的成员类来添加、 删除和查找集合中的链接。You can then use the members of the class to add, remove, and find links in the collection. 可以使用链接集合执行的任务类型的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on the types of tasks you can perform with the link collection, see . 当创建控件时，默认的超链接，其中包含中的所有文本控件添加到。When a control is created, a default hyperlink that contains all the text within the control is added to the . 可以通过指定与新链接区域覆盖此默认链接属性，或指定链接使用方法的。You can override this default link by specifying a new link area with the property, or specify a link using the method of the . 此外可通过删除默认超链接方法的类。You can also remove the default hyperlink by using the method of the class. 如果不需要指定多个链接来显示内，可以使用属性。If you do not need to specify more than one link to display within the , you can use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何使用类，与多个部分定义，以在窗体上显示的标签。The following example demonstrates using the class, with multiple sections defined, to display a label on a form. 该示例演示了如何设置， ， ， ，并可自定义查找范围的属性。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , and properties to customize the look of the . 第一个使用指定的属性。The first is specified using the property. 其他链接添加到使用方法。Additional links are added to the using the method. 示例句柄启动 Web 浏览器的超链接，并显示事件其他链接。The example handles the event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a for other links. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel/CPP/linklabel.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel/CS/linklabel.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel/VB/linklabel.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool LinkVisited { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.LinkVisited : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示链接是否应显示为如同被访问过的链接。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a link should be displayed as though it were visited.

value.span: 如果链接应显示为如同被访问过，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if links should display as though they were visited; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个控件不自动代表一个链接是访问过的链接。A control does not automatically denote that a link is a visited link. 若要将链接显示为访问过的链接，可以设置此属性设置为值`true`中的事件处理程序事件的。To display the link as a visited link, you can set the value of this property to `true` in an event handler for the event of a . 使用中指定的颜色显示访问过的链接属性的控件。A visited link is displayed using the color specified in the property of the control. 一次窗体包含控件是否已关闭，将删除与链接关联的"全部显示"状态。Once the form containing the control is closed, the "all display" state associated with the link is deleted. 若要保留的显示状态的链接，需要在与你的应用程序相关联的注册表设置中存储的链接的显示状态。In order to retain the display state of the link, you need to store the display state of the link in a registry setting associated with your application. > [!NOTE] > 此属性才影响中定义的第一个链接控件。This property only affects the first link defined in the control. 如果你有多个控件中指定的链接，使用属性的类。If you have more than one link specified in the control, use the property of the class. 您可以访问在定义的所有链接通过使用属性。You can access all the links defined in the by using the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何设置属性使用枚举。The following example demonstrates setting the property using the enumeration. 它还演示如何设置，和属性。It also demonstrates setting the , and properties. 若要运行此示例将其粘贴在空白的窗体并调用`InitializeLinkLabel`从窗体的构造函数或`Load`方法。To run this sample paste it in a blank form and call `InitializeLinkLabel` from the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可确定链接是否位于内部的特定点控件。This method enables you to determine whether a link is located at a specific point within a control. 可以在事件处理程序中使用此方法要确定是否将鼠标指针悬停在控件中的链接的控件的事件。You can use this method in an event handler for the event of the control to determine whether the mouse pointer is hovering over a link in the control. 一旦您已确定鼠标指针位于某个链接，然后可以通过向用户显示有关该链接的其他信息文本或。Once you have determined that the mouse pointer is over a link, you can then display additional information about the link to the user through text or a .

summary.span: 处理对话框键。

span.span: Processes a dialog key.

returns.span: 若值为 则使用该键；若值为 ，则允许进一步处理。

span.span: to consume the key; to allow further processing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在处理对话框字符，如选项卡，返回时，转义符和箭头键消息预处理期间调用此方法。This method is called during message pre-processing to handle dialog characters, such as TAB, RETURN, ESCAPE, and arrow keys. 仅当调用此方法`isInputKey`方法指示该控件不对感兴趣的密钥。This method is called only if the `isInputKey` method indicates that the control isn't interested in the key. `processDialogKey` 只需将字符发送给父级的`processDialogKey`方法或如果该控件没有父级时返回 false。`processDialogKey` simply sends the character to the parent's `processDialogKey` method, or returns false if the control has no parent. `Form`类重写此方法以执行实际处理对话框键。The `Form` class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog keys. 重写时`processDialogKey`，控制应返回`true`以指示它已处理该键。When overriding `processDialogKey`, a control should return `true` to indicate that it has processed the key. 有关控件的结果不处理的键`base.processDialogChar`应返回。For keys that aren't processed by the control, the result of `base.processDialogChar` should be returned. 控件将很少，如果有过，需要重写此方法。Controls will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool TabStop { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.TabStop : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户是否可以通过 Tab 键切换至 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user can tab to the .

value.span: 如果用户可以通过 Tab 键切换至 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user can tab to the ;otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是`true`默认情况下，只要不存在的长度大于零中至少一个链接集合。The property is `true` by default, as long as there is at least one link of greater than zero length in the collection. 控件都有一个值。The control has a single value. 但是，每个链接的长度大于零获取其自己的制表位，按从左到右顺序。However, each link of greater than zero length gets its own tab stop, in left-to-right order. 为了防止 tab 键导航到控件，将属性设置为`false`。To prevent tab navigation to the control, set the property to `false`. 但是，请注意，将新链接添加到集合将自动设置属性设置为`true`再次。However, be aware that adding new links to the collection will automatically set the property to `true` again.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event TabStopChanged As EventHandler

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`LinkLabel1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `LinkLabel1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#460](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#460)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#460](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#460)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseCompatibleTextRendering { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseCompatibleTextRendering : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定是使用 类 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) 还是 类 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) 呈现文本。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to use the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) or the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) to render text.

value.span: 如果类应该用于执行文本呈现，以便与 1.0 和 1.1 版中的兼容性。

span.span: if the class should be used to perform text rendering for compatibility with versions 1.0 and 1.1.

value.span: .NET framework 中;否则为。

span.span: of the .NET Framework; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`false`，则涵盖整个文本。If the property is set to `false`, the covers the entire text. 例如，如"abcd"的文本呈现与带下划线的尾随空格。For example, text such as "abcd " is rendered with the trailing space underlined. 如果属性设置为`true`，则不涵盖整个文本。If the property is set to `true`, the does not cover the entire text. `UseCompatibleTextRendering`属性用于提供 visual 兼容性 Windows 窗体控件之间呈现文本使用类和[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]的应用程序执行自定义文本呈现使用类。The `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property is intended to provide visual compatibility between Windows Forms controls that render text using the class and [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] applications that perform custom text rendering using the class. 在大多数情况下，如果不从升级您的应用程序[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]，则建议您保留`UseCompatibleTextRendering`设置的默认值为`false`。In most cases, if your application is not being upgraded from [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)], it is recommended that you leave `UseCompatibleTextRendering` set to the default value of `false`. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]基于类中引入了[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]为了提高性能，使文本看起来不错，并提高对国际字体支持。The [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] based class was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] to improve performance, make text look better, and improve support for international fonts. 在早期版本的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]，则[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]基于类用于执行所有文本呈现。In earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] based class was used to perform all text rendering. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 计算字符间距和自动换行中的不同[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]。calculates character spacing and word wrapping differently from [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]. 使用 Windows 窗体应用程序中类来呈现文本，这可能会导致使用的控件的文本才会显示不同的应用程序中的其他文本。In a Windows Forms application that uses the class to render text, this could cause the text for controls that use to appear different from the other text in the application. 若要解决此不兼容性，可以设置`UseCompatibleTextRendering`属性设置为`true`特定控件。To resolve this incompatibility, you can set the `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property to `true` for a specific control. 若要设置`UseCompatibleTextRendering`到`true`应用程序中的所有受支持控件，调用方法的参数替换`true`。To set `UseCompatibleTextRendering` to `true` for all supported controls in the application, call the method with a parameter of `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color VisitedLinkColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };
member this.VisitedLinkColor : System.Drawing.Color with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置当显示以前访问过的链接时所使用的颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the color used when displaying a link that has been previously visited.

value.span: ，它表示用来显示已访问过的链接的颜色。

span.span: A that represents the color used to display links that have been visited.

value.span: 默认颜色由系统指定，通常，此颜色为 。

span.span: The default color is specified by the system, typically this color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以指定为中的所有链接显示的颜色`LinkLabel`中具有已访问过的用户。This property enables you to specify the color that is displayed for all links in the `LinkLabel` that have been visited by the user. 有若干种与链接相关联的颜色。There are a number of colors associated with a link. 中的所有链接中定义的颜色与最初显示属性。All links in the are initially displayed with the color defined in the property. 属性，可在过程中被单击时指定链接的颜色。The property enables you to specify the color of the link when it is in the process of being clicked. 当禁用链接时，用于显示链接处于禁用状态。When a link is disabled, the is used to display the link in a disabled state. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性时，请确保颜色设置要与该控件的背景的颜色不冲突的属性或不正确显示文本。When setting this property, ensure that the color you are setting the property to does not conflict with the color of the control's background or the text does not display properly. 例如，如果该控件的背景色`Color.Red`和此属性设置为`Color.Red`，是不能正确显示文本时该链接显示为访问过的链接。For example, if the background color of the control is `Color.Red` and this property is set to `Color.Red`, the text is not shown properly when the link is displayed as a visited link. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何使用类，与多个部分定义，以在窗体上显示的标签。The following example demonstrates using the class, with multiple sections defined, to display a label on a form. 该示例演示了如何设置， ， ， ，并可自定义查找范围的属性。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , and properties to customize the look of the . 第一个使用指定的属性。The first is specified using the property. 其他链接添加到使用方法。Additional links are added to the using the method. 示例句柄启动 Web 浏览器的超链接，并显示事件其他链接。The example handles the event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a for other links. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel/CPP/linklabel.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel/CS/linklabel.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel/VB/linklabel.vb#1)]
